author: cwiklik
msg: UIMA-1705 Modified retryConnectionUntilSuccessfull() to mark MessageProducer in each UIMA AS client instance as invalid. This forces creation of a new Session and MessageProducer when connection is recovered.

author: jukka
msg: COMPRESS-93: Support for alternative ZIP compression methods
Allow entries with unsupported compression methods to be safely skipped if the compressed size of the entry is stored in the entry header.

author: cwiklik
msg: UIMA-1705 Create a new Session and MessageProducer when connection to broker is lost and subsequently recovered.
